flyer1.Explanation: {{1}} is pleased to announce the launch of our new website. It includes a growing list of features, such as:
flyer1.Private: A private user account for every member
flyer1.Notifications: By entering your email address or mobile number you will be able to receive important notifications by email or text message.
flyer1.GetStarted: To get started, in your web browser please carefully enter:
flyer1.IssuedToYou: This code is specifically issued to you.
